attributes.action: Abandon any support for the Bill of Human Rights in favour of a Bill of Human Duties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is reasonably argued that there is a bias in National and International Law in favour of the rights of those who injure society. The rights of the perpetrator are jealously guarded over the rights to protect property and life. The Bill of Human Rights absolves the guilty and blames the innocent. Support the mirror image concept that everyone should be made responsible and accountable for their own behaviour and that this should be enshrined in Law.
